name: Spirit Candle
text_description: The Spirit Candle provides a gentle aura of protection to its allies. When in play, it boosts the HP of all Spirit type cards by 5 points.
illustration_description: A delicate, translucent candle, glowing with a soothing blue light, stands amidst shadows. The flame flickers energetically, casting dancing patterns of spirit energy around it. The background is softly blurred, encouraging focus on the vibrant candle.
